CutSceneText.Text: All right, here's what you need to do. Listen carefully.
First, go into the cave and destroy the Aether Consuming Stone.
Then defeat Deputy Brigade General Yavant. He's in the Beritra Oracle Chamber.
That should stop the Aetheric Field Suppression Device,
and once the Aetheric Field comes back, the Balaur will no longer run rampant in Beluslan.
